name: Ritz (itch)
description:
CONTROLS

  • WASD / ARROW KEYS to MOVE
  • Z / SPACE / UP / W to JUMP
  • E / F / X to TALK
  • Works with gamepads

Your cool ass boy Ritz the rat has just been RATTED out by the anti-rat crew. His cheese gone...His hunger rising....help this rat get his fukken cheese back in the lair of illusions.

CREDS

Programming: ninjamuffin99

Art: MKMaffo and DIGIMIN

Music and Sounds: KawaiSprite

Made for Pixel Day on Newgrounds

Source code is on Github
